content.text:
<image 1> What is the common term for the yellow area surrounding the site of an infection?

A. I don't know and I don't want to guess
B. Corona
C. Border
D. Halo
E. Toxin zone

The common term for the yellow area surrounding the site of an infection on a leaf is:

D. Halo

This yellow area is often referred to as a "halo" because it appears as a lighter ring around the infected or damaged tissue, similar to a halo in appearance.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
